alert.note: Alert for Hancock; McDonough (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued March 24 at 8:31PM CDT until March 27 at 12:25AM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Quad Cities IA IL has issued a Flood Watch for the following rivers in Illinois... Rock River near Joslin affecting Rock Island, Henry IL and Whiteside Counties. Rock River at Moline affecting Henry IL and Rock Island Counties. ...The Flood Watch continues for the following rivers in Illinois... La Moine River at Colmar affecting Hancock and McDonough Counties. ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY AFTERNOON TO EARLY MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding is possible. * WHERE...La Moine River at Colmar. * WHEN...From Saturday afternoon to early Monday morning. * IMPACTS...At 20.0 feet, Water affects the lowest portions of Lambert Road and affects Lamar Road approximately 100 feet north of the intersection with County Road 26. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:45 AM CDT Friday the stage was 11.3 feet. - Forecast...Flood stage may be reached early tomorrow afternoon. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. - &&
info.instruction: If you are in the watch area, remain alert to possible flooding. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/quadcities. The next statement will be issued Saturday morning.
